articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "My Bowling Overseas Has Been...": Ravichandran Ashwin Breaks Silence On WTC Final Snub - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Ravichandran Ashwin wasn't picked in the Indian team's playing XI for the World Test Championship final against Australia. He has now broken silence on the snub.
articles.content: Ravichandran Ashwin, the No. 1 Test bowler in the world, couldn't find a place in the Indian team's playing XI for the World Test Championship final against Australia. For many, Ashwin's absence from… [+2034 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Luntz
articles.title: Meet The Giant Armored Fossil Skink Twice As Big As Largest Surviving Species - IFLScience
articles.description: Fifty thousand years ago in Australia, even the skinks were chonky.
articles.content: A newly described species of skink was 1,000 times heavier than the typical member of that family. The largest known skink went extinct 47,000 years ago, at the same time as many other Australian gia… [+3542 chars]
